page.title: 14NORMAN PIETTE
page.content: Norman Piette is a{building supplies company.They've a plumbing department with different shapes and sizes of pipes.They also keep white bathroom equipment there.The coloured bathroom equipment is in the showrooms.They saw their own wood into broom handles, window sills and skirting boards.They have got three different kinds of sand for building.They have got one piece of machinery called the side loader which picks things up on its side. They've got another machine that takes air out and puts liquid in to preserve wood which is the only one in Guernsey.They bag their own sand as well.They've got two kinds of bricks, a fancy brick and a house brick.They have a{wood store and saw mill}across the road.In the{Do It Yourself}shop they have tools,bathroom and kitchen furniture,paint and wallpaper.
